import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-index-header', templateUrl: './index-header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./index-header.component.css'] }) export class IndexHeaderComponent{ constructor(private router: Router){ } startAgain(){ localStorage.clear(); this.router.navigate([""]); } }
